nodes.title: Add truststore to trust LetsEncrypt & DST
Rename zwave stubs to support old iris2 code
Disable wifi/ipcd devices that aren't likely to be supported.
Fix issue with configuring paired security devices (#38)
Improve crypto libraries, switch to AES GCM
Add fatjar (shadowjar) target for platform-client to support building in the app
Allow global and metrics topic retention to be configured
Add rule to turn on/off hvacfan depending on temperature.
Run platform containers as "arcus" user instead of root
Use eyeris/java instead of deprecated dockerfile/java
Allow keyspace to be configured when provisioning
Fix some local formatting in SubsystemConfig
Allow cassandra commitlog size to be configured
Allow cassandra hostname to be configured
Add support for changing listener in cassandra, kafka, and zookeeper
Remove oracle java related references, update LANG setting
Allow Twitter handle to be set via environment variable
Rename "Iris" to "Arcus" in push notification templates
Add scripts to facilitate tagging and pushing docker containers to GCR and DockerHub
Allow kafka server name to be configured
Add support for using tls key/cert without using java KeyStore
Allow device-ota-firmware to be set via environment variables (fixes #33)
Fix dependencies for runDocker (partial fix for #4)
Use default truststore password of "changeit" as required on yocto linux
Add ultraviolet index capability, driver support
Add tamper support for IRIS v1 Motion Sensor
Increase heap size when creating topics
Disable arcus-kairosdb as upstream is broken
Populate hub offline message as "Arcus Cloud" instead of "IRIS Cloud"
Add ZWave Ecolink Firefighter smoke/co listener
Rate limit FireScene to once per time period (#202)
Allow schedules to be recalculated in event of error (#198)
Add device id for Aeotec range extender 7
Bump governator and guice, add dep on governator-api
Ignore missing git repo when not in root of repository
Add jvm attributes gauges, including uptime
Allow kafka replicator class to be configured
Allow metric reporter to be disabled
Add preliminary replacement for Cassandra service management
Add support for Aeotec Range Extender 6
Change schema to arcussmarthome, group to com.arcussmarthome
Rename eyeris in container names to arcus
Create ZWave CmdClass Map only once
Use old netty for notification-services until pushy can be updated
Automate release for khakis and platform
Allow default service level to be configured (#61)
Add a rule to change dimmer on motion
Change package from zw to zwave for compat with existing implementation
Allow firmware updates to be configured per model, in addition to version ranges
Fix a couple of errors, including build breaker
Add a few generic ipcd devices
Add support for running the agent locally
